subject: Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Francena McCorory won the women’s 400 meters in the United States Outdoor Track and Field Championships in Sacramento, finishing in 49.48 seconds to edge the Olympic champion Sanya Richards-Ross.
snippet: Francena McCorory won the women’s 400 meters in the United States Outdoor Track and Field Championships in Sacramento, finishing in 49.48 seconds to edge the Olympic champion Sanya Richards-Ross.
